txt.en: You have successfully brought these pure waters to the source of the Morgulduin in hopes of beginning the process of purifying the tainted river. You have done a great service to all those working to reclaim Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
Add pure water to the source of the Morgulduin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The waters of the Morgulduin are deadly at its source.\n\nYou should attempt to purify the deadly waters of the Morgulduin River.

'Arodor has asked me to give you these phials. They were brought to us by the Elves of Lothl√≥rien and contain pure waters from high mountain springs. We believe that if this water is brought to the source of the Morgulduin River, it may begin to cleanse itself of the years of defilement. If you are to venture inside the Filth-well of Eithel Gwaur, bring these phials with you and begin the process to purify the river.'
There is much for the White Company to accomplish in reclaiming Minas Ithil from the remnants of Sauron's forces.
Added pure water to the source of the Morgulduin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
